header_title: Build modern interfaces with the Gravity design system and libraries
banner_content: We are collecting questions for the Markdown editor webinar, please fill out the form!
news_items_item1: Finally, we have launched a blog!
news_items_item2: We've created a component ‚Äî Color Picker now you can easily select colors with an intuitive interface, HEX/RGB format support, and optional alpha channel.
news_items_item3: We've launched the AIKit library, start building functional AI chats easily and quickly!
features_feature1_description: Conceived as an in-house solution in response to real developers' needs, we released Gravity to the open-source community.
features_feature2_description: Experienced designers curate the look of our libraries, ensuring that components are stylish and consistent, with support for dark mode and high-contrast themes.
features_feature3_description: Regular feedback from our community of developers allows us to continuously improve our libraries, and break compatibility only when necessary.
roadmap_items_item2: Themer 1.5 Support of theme export to Figma
